item.title: [COLOR red][B]Mục 1 - Xem bằng link K+ (Tiếng Việt)[/B][/COLOR]
[COLOR deepskyblue][B]-> K+ có thể chỉ phát các ngày cuối tuần[/B][/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <item> <title>[COLOR dodgerblue]B[COLOR lightblue]F[/COLOR]X[/COLOR]: [COLOR greenyellow][B][makelist.param1][/COLOR] [COLOR springgreen][makelist.param2][/COLOR] [COLOR khaki][makelist.param3][/COLOR][COLOR cyan] [Channel [makelist.param4]][/B][/COLOR]</title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=$doregex[hash]&mode=1&name=BassFox Premier League:[makelist.param3]</link> <regex> <name>hash</name> <expres>this.loadPlayer\("(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://arenavision.in/AV[makelist.param4]</page> <referer>http://arenavision.in</referer> <setcookie>beget=begetok</setcookie> </regex> <thumbnail>http://www.elbanquillodealfie.es/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/2016-17-Premier-league-sleeve-patch-2.jpg</thumbnail> <fanart>https://cdn0.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/yUs4pWI4BLTSsN0_4ShM-9sS10c=/0x30:4126x2781/1310x873/cdn0.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_image/image/48779295/2016-bpl-logo.0.0.jpg</fanart> </item>
